I actually think this is a perfect meta to bet live. If a team is ahead with even comps, they are most likely to win. Main concern is a team with adc vs no adc, or pick comp vs teamfight comp. Sometimes team throws free game like SKT just did at baron, but they are just dumb. I had a lot of success betting live, especially when team wins teamfight and you know they will take baron in a minute and then just push to win.

If a team leads like 3k gold early or take 3 turrets to 0 with even looking comps it's usually their game - if they are any good at all. Yes SKT really blew this but 9/10 times it would be won. Books know that baron = win most of the time so they close it. But sometimes they don't know if the team will risk baron yet

TBH The guy you are asking sounds like a total conspiracy believer. What he says about "commercial media" is not even close to the heavy propaganda machine operated by national TV and the government. I'm also fairly conservative, but IMO the threat to democracy from PiS is quite real. They are currently in serious conflict with the Supreme Court and the recent scandal is not just a simple case of paid trolling, it's a very deliberate smearing campaign.

That's a stupid excuse made by Blizzard and we shouldn't support that. Why even make a half-assed game, if all your answers are: sorry, no resources? They have enough resources to make 1 million useless sprays to fill lootboxes. Blizzard is a greedy behemoth running on peoples naivety.
they are wasting tons of manpower on even more useless lootbox fillers to make people waste more money

We don't have a balanced budget. They are doing lots of creative accounting, juggling money from one fund to another to hide the deficit. All that to sell a propaganda of a balanced budget. Don't buy into politicians' lies.

Wow, I wish Reddit was a bit more sceptical about politician promises. Polish economy is growing every year, so how come they are just now all of the sudden managing to make this "miracle"? Because they are using some one-off tricks like selling Co2 emission rights and 5g mobile frequencies to make this one (election) year look good, and the budget will go back to shit following years.
and ZUS is not eating away funds? do you not remember how last government was deemed traitors for messing with OFE? and now we are told to be happy that they delete it. propaganda at its finest

Little backstory: there is a huge scandal going on with current president of Supreme Audit Office being implicated (according to journalists) in criminal activity.
